text: wanh law sar alkufaar min al'iins waljinu ealaa tariqat al'islam, walam yhydu eanha lanzlna ealayhim ma'an kthyrana, wlwssaena ealayhim alrizq fi aldnya; lnkhtbrhm: kayf yashkurun nem allah elyhm? waman yuerd ean taeat rabih wastmae alquran wtdbrh, waleamal bih yudkhilh edhabana shdydana shaqqana
